item.content: <speak> <amazon:emotion name= 'disappointed' intensity= 'medium'> Hi there! I'm sorry to hear you are experiencing a scam. I can help you learn where to report it! </amazon:emotion> This is the USA dot gov scams wizard. No need to tell me any personal information, just say which category applies. Say 'financial scam' if your accounts or loans are affected. Say 'moving scam' regarding a scam moving company or movers. Say 'fraud' if the scam involves identity theft. Say 'impostor' if the scam involves someone pretending to be someone they are not, including a love interest, or phishing. Say 'something else' if none apply.</speak>
